PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-14692017-11-29,  ,  PMO,  , 
ActPublic Service Employment Act
SubjectOrder Designating the Department of Indigenous Services Canada as a Department for the purposes of the Act
PrecisOrder pursuant to paragraph (b) of the definition (1) department in subsection 2(1) of the PUBLIC SERVICE EMPLOYMENT ACT, designates the Department of Indigenous Services Canada as a department for the purposes of that Act; and (2) deputy head in subsection 2(1) of the PUBLIC SERVICE EMPLOYMENT ACT, designates the Deputy Minister of the Department of Indigenous Services Canada as the deputy head of that entity for the purposes of that Act.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2017-0079 Publication Date: 2017-12-13
